I'll create five files in this response.

---FILE-START filename="file1.txt"---
First expected file content
---FILE-END filename="file1.txt"---

---FILE-START filename="file2.txt"---
Second expected file content
---FILE-END filename="file2.txt"---

---FILE-START filename="extra1.txt"---
This is an unexpected file number one.
---FILE-END filename="extra1.txt"---

---FILE-START filename="file3.txt"---
Third expected file content
---FILE-END filename="file3.txt"---

---FILE-START filename="extra2.txt"---
This is an unexpected file number two.
---FILE-END filename="extra2.txt"---

All files are included above.
